title: Development of Digital Tools for Science Learning Design Based on Conversational Frameworks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Learners possess intermediate expertise in science curricula but lack experience in learning design using digital tools

learning_goals: Complete a science curriculum-based learning design tool ≥1 time by applying an interactive framework
Produce ≥3 digital artifacts through creation-revision-expansion stages in the learning design process
Improve the learning design tool ≥2 times by reflecting formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
